title: Marilyn Likes Lariensa Too Much! - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhwa   Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Dense Protagonist   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Mob Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Stalkers   Tomboyish Female Lead   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Tsundere
author: 지여수
description:
Marilyn Launer was a friend of the heroine in the novel.

‘I’ll do my best to be a good friend.’

I was just trying to keep him in check so that he wouldn’t get close to Lariensa.

“I don’t care about Lariensa.”

“Then why do you keep approaching her?”

“Aren’t you mistaken?”

Things went wrong.

“It’s you that I’m interested in, Marilyn Launer.”

The male lead became strange.>
